Name: Statue of Imhotep on Stool
Description: Imhotep is portrayed seated on a backless stool. He wears a long garment fastened at the front with a knot on the chest and has sandals on his feet. The rims of his eyes and his eyelashes are gold; the whites of the eyes are silver. The papyrus on his lap does not bear any text. There are hieroglyphic inscriptions round the base and the name of Imhotep is written on it.
